name: Neck Circles
description: Slowly rotate your head in large circles, first clockwise then counter-clockwise. Keep shoulders relaxed.

name: Arm Circles
description: Extend arms to sides and make large circles. Start small and gradually increase size. Reverse direction halfway.

name: Shoulder Shrugs
description: Raise shoulders toward ears slowly, hold briefly, then release. Focus on the stretch and release.

name: Shoulder Rolls
description: Roll shoulders forward in large circles, then reverse to roll backward. Keep motion controlled.

name: Torso Twists
description: Stand with feet shoulder-width, arms relaxed. Slowly twist torso left and right, letting arms swing naturally.

name: Hip Circles
description: Place hands on hips and make large circles with hips. Clockwise then counter-clockwise.

name: Ankle Circles
description: Lift one foot and rotate ankle in circles. Do both directions, then switch feet.

name: Knee Hugs
description: Stand tall, lift one knee toward chest and hug it. Hold briefly, then switch legs.

name: Calf Raises
description: Stand on toes, hold the contraction, then lower heels slowly. Repeat rhythmically.

name: Standing Quad Stretch
description: Stand on one leg, pull other foot toward glutes. Keep knees together, stand tall. Switch sides.

name: Standing Hamstring Stretch
description: Extend one leg forward, hinge at hips and reach toward toes. Keep back straight. Switch legs.

name: Standing Groin Stretch
description: Stand wide, bend one knee and lean to that side. Feel stretch in inner thigh. Switch sides.

name: Side Lunges
description: Step wide to one side, bend knee and lean into the stretch. Keep other leg straight. Switch sides.

name: Walking Lunges
description: Step forward into a lunge, then drive through front heel to stand and step forward with other leg.

name: Butt Kicks
description: Jog in place, kicking heels toward glutes. Keep upper body stable, land softly.

name: High Knees
description: Jog in place, lifting knees as high as possible. Pump arms for momentum. Stay light on feet.

name: Jumping Jacks (Slow)
description: Jump feet wide while raising arms overhead. Jump back together and lower arms. Do slowly to warm up.

name: Mountain Climbers (Slow)
description: Start in high plank. Slowly draw one knee toward chest, then switch. Keep hips level.

name: Inchworm Walk
description: Stand tall, bend forward and walk hands out to plank. Walk hands back to feet and stand. Repeat.

name: Child's Pose
description: Kneel, sit back on heels, reach arms forward on floor. Breathe deeply and relax.

name: Cat-Cow Stretch
description: On hands and knees, arch back up like a cat, then drop belly and lift chest. Move slowly between positions.

name: Downward Dog
description: Push hips up and back, forming inverted V with body. Press chest toward thighs, heels toward ground.

name: World's Greatest Stretch
description: Lunge forward, place opposite hand down, rotate torso toward front leg. Reach arm to sky. Switch sides.

name: Leg Swings
description: Hold wall for balance. Swing one leg forward and back in controlled motion. Do both legs.

name: Tricep Cross Body Stretch
description: Reach one arm across body, use other hand to gently pull. Feel stretch in back of arm. Switch arms.

name: Chest Opener
description: Clasp hands behind back, squeeze shoulder blades, lift arms slightly. Open chest and breathe.
